titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace, to confirme to his subiects their defectiue titles or estates.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Whitehall, the thirteenth day of February, in the sixteenth yeere of our raigne ..
The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 12; Steele notation: that all 2) to intru-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
